resources.string:
This is the select menu, it opens when no dice are on screen or when you tap the "SELECT" button. Select a type of die from the menu to add it. 
 
Tap the "ADD" button to add more of you selected type. 
 
Tap a die to replace or remove it. 
 
When you're ready - start rolling!
This app is inspired by the Android Developer Course on Udacity as well as Critical Roll. \n \nThe die symbols in the menus are by Lonnie Tapscott from the Noun Project.

I'm from Germany and, as of November 2020, am studying and developing on my own after recently finishing school and soon starting to study at university. 
 
You can find me on GitHub.
